lead_paragraph: The United States women’s team will play Norway on July 14 in East Hartford, Conn., as part of a six-game send-off series before the Women’s World Cup in China, which begins Sept. 10. The game will be played at Rentschler Field and televised live on ESPN2. The team also would play host to China on June 16 in Cleveland and Brazil on June 23 in East Rutherford, N.J. Games also are scheduled for July 28, Aug. 12 and Aug. 25, but the cities have not been announced.
